entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning early this morning then changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
